item.title: Goldman's top trades for the first quarter include long Nike and short Ford
item.description: Goldman picked Nike as a top long idea for the next quarter and believes that shares can recover as demand and profitability accelerate.

item.title: Here are Mizuho's top picks for January including Chewy
item.description: Mizuho's list also includes a key e-commerce firm.

item.title: Quantum stocks like Rigetti plunge after Nvidia's Huang says the computers are 15 to 30 years away
item.description: Quantum computing stocks dropped Wednesday after Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang declared that useful quantum computers are likely decades in the future.

item.title: European wind stocks tumble after Trump says he will stop new turbine construction
item.description: The president-elect went on a lengthy attack against wind turbines during a news conference.

item.title: A once popular tech play has lost its way. How to capitalize on it using options
item.description: Tony Zhang describes a debit vertical spread in Western Digital.
